trans-unit.source: In Solution Explorer in Visual Studio, expand the App_Start folder and open the WebApiConfig.cs project file.
trans-unit.target: In Solution Explorer in Visual Studio, expand the App_Start folder and open the WebApiConfig.cs project file.

trans-unit.source: Add the following line of code to the Register method after the ConfigOptions definition:
trans-unit.target: Add the following line of code to the Register method after the ConfigOptions definition:

trans-unit.source: This enforces user authentication before registering for push notifications.
trans-unit.target: This enforces user authentication before registering for push notifications.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the project, click Add then click Class....
trans-unit.target: Right-click the project, click Add then click Class....

trans-unit.source: Name the new empty class PushRegistrationHandler then click Add.
trans-unit.target: Name the new empty class PushRegistrationHandler then click Add.

trans-unit.source: At the top of the code page, add the following using statements:

trans-unit.source: Replace the existing PushRegistrationHandler class with the following code:
trans-unit.target: Replace the existing PushRegistrationHandler class with the following code:

trans-unit.source: The Register method is called during registration.
trans-unit.target: The Register method is called during registration.

trans-unit.source: This lets you add a tag to the registration that is the ID of the logged-in user.
trans-unit.target: This lets you add a tag to the registration that is the ID of the logged-in user.

trans-unit.source: The supplied tags are validated to prevent a user from registering for another user's ID.
trans-unit.target: The supplied tags are validated to prevent a user from registering for another user's ID.

trans-unit.source: When a notification is sent to this user, it is received on this and any other device registered by the user.
trans-unit.target: When a notification is sent to this user, it is received on this and any other device registered by the user.

trans-unit.source: Expand the Controllers folder, open the TodoItemController.cs project file, locate the PostTodoItem method and replace the line of code that calls SendAsync with the following code:
trans-unit.target: Expand the Controllers folder, open the TodoItemController.cs project file, locate the PostTodoItem method and replace the line of code that calls SendAsync with the following code:

trans-unit.source: Now, the service uses the user ID tag to send a push notification (with the text of the inserted item) to all registrations created by the logged-in user.
trans-unit.target: Now, the service uses the user ID tag to send a push notification (with the text of the inserted item) to all registrations created by the logged-in user.
